thread.section_title: MARAIS HOme Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Little, but cute and convenient
thread.title_full: Little, but cute and convenient - Review of MARAIS HOme Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Patricia L
title: Little, but cute and convenient
text:
The hotel room was small, which was to be expected, but very clean, which was nice. In addition, it was very close to the Republique subway stop, which made it very convenient for traveling around Paris. The front desk was extremely helpful. Would definitely stay there again!
Room Tip: There is an elevator to all the floors See more room tips
